description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.7g92mxtUXeF8k35K]{False Reality}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.Xl2rCReZPQ8xKtwa]{Legion's Hold}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.4Vhfl1IPORzuobHB]{Meteor Swarm}

Published in Heroes of the Fallen Lands, page(s) 193.
